We must do all we can to protect Social Security and Medicare!

A recent report from the administration found that Social Security and Medicare funds face insolvency, and that 50-year-old's may not get full retirement benefits.

This should not be a partisan issue.

GlenCove schools have most of its children in the free & reduced lunch prog, yet the limited (very) wealthy families make it look like a wealthy school dist. Westbury has the same issue (think OldWestbury incl w/New Cassel) For years we have talked about this issue to no avail! pic.twitter.com/o2omwWrGak
Senator Jim Gaughran finally got it addressed!!! Great job Senator!!!

For years Glen Cove has suffered under wrongheaded school aid formulas. Because Glen Cove has some very wealthy families, it‚Äôs Combined Wealth Ratios make the very low income & lower-middle-income families look like they have higher incomes than they do.

I just spoke to State @SenatorGaughran, who is up in Albany. He & the Long Island 6 delivered a $125 million increase in state aid to Long Island school districts.
Glen Cove did especially well; 9% increase/$1.3 million.
